name: Snowball Fight Game
storyline: Throw snowballs and parry your way through multiple bosses and a variety of enemies as you progress through hand-crafted levels full of challenges and surprises. Master the art of parrying and time your throws perfectly as you battle back the permafrost. Be a legend and make it to the end where something special will be waiting. The fate of the world rests on your snowballs! It's not going to be easy!!
summary: Snowball Fight Game is a one button, bullet-hell action game, featuring progressively difficult hand-crafted levels and bosses. It pays homage to retro-flash games of old with its simple controls and satisfying gameplay.
